Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a grey-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is partly spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and faint traces of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394397) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394397)
